title: Allan Gardens Winter Flower Show
caption: Festive botanical display
desc: Between December 1 and January 12, Allan Gardens Conservatory is hosting the Winter Flower Show that transforms the indoor botanical garden into a colourful festive site. Thousands of plants and blooms take over the entire conservatory featuring floral decor inspired by the holiday season. Entrance to this event in Toronto is free of cost and in addition to taking in the fresh blooms, visitors to this site can also enjoy horse-drawn wagon rides, cookies and cider and festive crafts for the entire family.
